original_text: And in the same region there were shepherds out in the field, keeping watch over their flock by night.
korean_text: 그 지역에 목자들이 밤에 밖에서 자기 양 떼를 지키더니

sentences.original_text: And in the same region there were shepherds out in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 같은 지역에 목자들이 들에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: keeping watch over their flock by night.
sentences.korean_translation: 밤에 자기 양 떼를 지키고 있었습니다.
